item.title: Spec bar always yellow text + hitDiff incorrect?
item.dc:creator: @killamess killamess
item.description:
@killamess wrote:

add something like

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 ) { ProjectileSpec(432, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }
try adding it around the part where it gives experience, EXAMPLE: search to totalexp you will no what i mean

Read full topic

item.title: Spec bar always yellow text + hitDiff incorrect?
item.dc:creator: @Mmm1 Mmm.
item.description:
@Mmm1 wrote:

Is the default color for the text supposed to be red or yellow?

@bla@ doesn’t work for me, but if the default color is red and it’s not going red something is up.

Read full topic
